Name: Buoyant
About the game: How long can you survive in this abstract game of survival? Surf an endless wave, avoiding enemies and collecting rings. Simple one-button gameplay, enjoyable wave physics and a sublime soundtrack combine to make an addictive and challenging score-based game. Featuring music from Astropilot, Tomas Novoa and more this is gorgeous way to surf an alien seascape whilst competing against your friends on the leaderboards.
Meta Title: Buoyant: Jul 9, 2019, New Star Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Buoyant? Check out the release date (Jul 9, 2019), developer insights from New Star Games, and a complete game summary.
